_meta.description: Cloudiverse Domain Strategies (Domain-driven questioning + defaults + add-ons). Defaults are auto-applied into workspace axes and therefore MUST NOT be asked again. Add-ons are only shown if their trigger conditions indicate they are missing/unknown.
_meta.axis_key_convention: snake_case (matches workflow axes like backup_retention_days, primary_region_hint).

global_critical_axes.question: How long do you need to keep backups (days)?
global_critical_axes.why: Backup retention impacts cost, recovery, and compliance.

global_critical_axes.question: Where are most of your end users located, or which region do you prefer?
Do you need to comply with any specific regulations?
global_critical_axes.why: Compliance changes security posture, audit logging, and retention.

addon_trigger_rules.semantics: A trigger matches if current workspace axes meet ALL conditions. A condition value can be a single value or an array of acceptable values.

static_content.label: Static & Content Platforms
static_content.description: Portfolio, marketing sites, blogs, docs, CMS sites, news portals.

critical_axes.question: Where are most of your visitors located?
Is traffic steady or spiky (campaigns, launches)?
Do you need search across articles/docs/pages?
Do you need logins (members-only content)?

addons.label: Custom domain + SSL
addons.description: Add DNS + TLS/HTTPS setup for a production domain.

addons.label: Analytics integration
addons.description: Traffic analytics and conversion tracking.

addons.label: Form handling
addons.description: Contact forms or newsletter signup processing.

saas_web_app.label: SaaS Web Applications
saas_web_app.description: CRMs, dashboards, HR tools, subscription software, internal tools.

critical_axes.question: Is it multi-tenant (multiple companies/orgs using the same app)?
Do users need to sign in?
How complex are permissions (roles vs fine-grained policies)?
Primary data model (SQL relational, document, etc.)?
Do you need subscriptions/usage-based billing?
What level of sensitive data is stored?

addons.label: Admin dashboard / backoffice
addons.description: Operations panel for support staff to manage users, plans, and data.

addons.label: In-app search
addons.description: Search across records (customers, tickets, projects, etc.).

addons.label: Enterprise SSO (SAML/OIDC)
addons.description: Add stronger authentication posture for enterprise customers.

ecommerce_marketplace.label: E-Commerce & Marketplaces
ecommerce_marketplace.description: Online stores, booking systems, multi-vendor platforms, ticketing.

critical_axes.question: Do you need to accept payments?
Any compliance requirements (PCI, GDPR, etc.)?
Do you need product search/filtering?
Is traffic spiky (sales/events) or steady?
Primary database model (most commerce is relational/SQL).

addons.label: Payments hardening (PCI posture)
addons.description: Stronger security posture for payment flows.

addons.label: Order notifications (email/SMS)
addons.description: Transactional updates for orders, shipping, OTP, etc.

addons.label: Background processing (queues/workers)
addons.description: For emails, invoices, webhooks, async processing.

api_backend.label: API-Only & Backend Platforms
api_backend.description: Mobile app backends, public APIs, microservices, webhook services.

critical_axes.question: Is this a public API exposed to third-party developers?
Do callers need authentication/authorization?
Expected peak request rate (RPS)?
Do you need queues/workers for async tasks?
Primary data model?

addons.label: API protection (rate limits + WAF posture)
addons.description: Harden the public API against abuse and bots.

addons.label: Webhook delivery system
addons.description: Retries + async delivery require queues/workers.

media_streaming.label: Media & Streaming Platforms
media_streaming.description: Video platforms, audio/podcast hosting, file sharing, live streaming, LMS media delivery.

critical_axes.question: Do you need to store and serve media files (uploads)?
Expected media storage size?
Traffic pattern (steady vs spiky)?
How latency/performance-sensitive is media delivery?
Do you need realtime/live features (live streaming, conferencing)?

addons.label: Content protection (signed URLs / access control)
addons.description: Restrict access to private media with auth-based delivery.

addons.label: Transcoding / processing pipeline
addons.description: Async media processing (thumbnails, transcoding) requires queues/jobs.

addons.label: Monetization (subscriptions/payments)
addons.description: Enable paid plans or pay-per-view access.

realtime_collaboration.label: Realtime & Collaboration Products
realtime_collaboration.description: Chat apps, collaborative editors, multiplayer games, live dashboards (product experience depends on realtime interaction).

critical_axes.question: Which realtime transport do you need (websockets, sse, pubsub)?
Expected peak concurrent connections?
How latency-sensitive is the product?
Do you need strict message ordering/delivery guarantees?
Do users need to sign in?

addons.label: Presence + typing indicators
addons.description: User presence, typing events, online/offline state propagation.

addons.label: Delivery guarantees (retries + dead-lettering)
addons.description: Add queueing/retry semantics for event delivery and fan-out.

addons.label: Abuse protection (rate limits + WAF posture)
addons.description: Mitigate connection floods, spam, and bot abuse.

mobile_first_platforms.label: Mobile-First Platforms
mobile_first_platforms.description: Consumer apps, ride-sharing, fitness apps, social mobile apps (primary interface is mobile).

critical_axes.question: Are mobile apps the primary clients (iOS/Android)?
Do you need push notifications (FCM/APNs)?
Do you need offline mode with sync/conflict handling?
Do you need location tracking/geofencing features?
Do users need to sign in?

addons.label: Push notifications
addons.description: Device tokens, segmentation, delivery retries, and notification templates.

addons.label: Offline sync + conflict resolution
addons.description: Sync engine for intermittent connectivity and conflict handling.

addons.label: Mobile analytics + crash reporting
addons.description: Event tracking, funnels, cohorts, and crash diagnostics.

data_analytics_platforms.label: Data & Analytics Platforms
data_analytics_platforms.description: BI dashboards, event tracking, data lakes, ETL, analytics SaaS.

critical_axes.question: Expected data volume (storage size)?
Is ingestion primarily batch or streaming?
Desired query latency tier?
How long do you need to retain analytics data (days)?
Is it multi-tenant (multiple orgs/customers)?

addons.label: Streaming ingestion (pub/sub + stream processing)
addons.description: Real-time ingestion and processing with durable buffers.

addons.label: Data warehouse / semantic layer
addons.description: Curated models and faster BI query patterns.

addons.label: Data governance + audit logging
addons.description: Lineage, access auditing, and stronger governance posture.

ai_ml_products.label: AI / ML Products
ai_ml_products.description: AI chat apps, model inference APIs, recommendation systems, AI automation tools.

critical_axes.question: Will this run model inference in production?
Do you require GPUs for serving/training?
Do you need vector search/embeddings retrieval?
Data privacy level for prompts/documents?
Is this exposed as a public API to third parties?

addons.label: Vector database / embeddings store
addons.description: Enable retrieval-augmented generation and similarity search.

addons.label: Model monitoring + feedback loops
addons.description: Track latency, token usage, quality metrics, and drift signals.

addons.label: Safety guardrails (moderation + policy enforcement)
addons.description: Prompt/response filtering and policy checks.

iot_device_platforms.label: IoT & Device Platforms
iot_device_platforms.description: Smart home systems, fleet tracking, sensor ingestion, edge computing.

critical_axes.question: How many devices will connect (approximate scale)?
Telemetry ingestion rate (events per second tier)?
Do you need edge compute/gateway processing?
Do you need OTA firmware/app updates?
Do devices need strong identity (certs/keys) and provisioning?

addons.label: Device provisioning + identity
addons.description: Certificates/keys, device registry, secure onboarding workflows.

addons.label: OTA firmware updates
addons.description: Signed update artifacts, staged rollouts, and rollback safety.

addons.label: Telemetry buffering (durable queues)
addons.description: Buffer bursts and intermittent connectivity with durable ingestion.

enterprise_internal_systems.label: Enterprise & Internal Business Systems
enterprise_internal_systems.description: ERP, finance systems, inventory systems, corporate portals.

critical_axes.question: Do employees need to sign in?
How complex are permissions (roles vs fine-grained policies)?
Do you need integrations (HRIS, CRM, accounting, SSO, etc.)?
Do you need audit logs (who changed what, when)?
What level of sensitive data is stored?

addons.label: Enterprise SSO (SAML/OIDC)
addons.description: Integrate with corporate identity providers for centralized access control.

addons.label: Audit logging + tamper-resistant trails
addons.description: Track admin and data changes for compliance and investigations.

addons.label: Integration connectors (ETL/iPaaS)
addons.description: Prebuilt connectors for common enterprise systems and data sync.

fintech_regulated_financial.label: FinTech & Regulated Financial Systems
fintech_regulated_financial.description: Banking apps, payment gateways, trading systems, KYC/AML services.

critical_axes.question: Any compliance requirements (PCI, SOC2, ISO27001, etc.)?
Do you need to accept or process payments?
Do you need immutable audit trails (transactions, admin actions)?
Authentication strength needed?
Is ultra-low latency required (e.g., trading)?

addons.label: Payments hardening (PCI posture)
addons.description: Additional controls for payment flows, tokenization, and strong auth.

addons.label: Fraud detection / risk scoring
addons.description: Add real-time rules + ML scoring with investigation workflows.

addons.label: Key management / HSM posture
addons.description: Stronger crypto controls for signing, encryption, and tokenization.

healthcare_life_sciences.label: Healthcare & Life Sciences Systems
healthcare_life_sciences.description: EHR, telemedicine, medical imaging, wearable health systems.

critical_axes.question: Any compliance requirements (HIPAA, GDPR, ISO27001, etc.)?
What level of sensitive data is stored?
Do you need to store large medical files (images, scans, reports)?
Do you need realtime/live features (telemedicine, monitoring)?
Do you need audit logs for record access and edits?

addons.label: HIPAA posture pack
addons.description: Hardened logging, access controls, retention, and vendor agreements support.

addons.label: Patient consent management
addons.description: Consent capture, revocation, and fine-grained access enforcement.

addons.label: De-identification / redaction pipeline
addons.description: Automated PHI redaction for sharing datasets safely.

education_learning_platforms.label: Education & Learning Platforms
education_learning_platforms.description: LMS, online courses, virtual classrooms, assessments.

critical_axes.question: Do learners/teachers need to sign in?
Do you need realtime/live features (virtual classrooms, chat)?
Do you host video/material uploads?
Is usage seasonal/spiky (exam weeks, enrollments)?
Do you need payments for courses/subscriptions?

addons.label: Proctoring / anti-cheat controls
addons.description: Harden exam integrity with device checks, audit trails, and anomaly detection hooks.

addons.label: Certificates + badges
addons.description: Issue certificates, track completions, and generate verifiable credentials.

addons.label: Realtime classroom suite
addons.description: Chat, attendance, hand-raise, and live session coordination.

government_public_sector.label: Government & Public Sector Systems
government_public_sector.description: Citizen portals, tax systems, digital ID, public data platforms.

critical_axes.question: Is data residency required (must stay in-country/region)?
Do citizens/officials need to sign in?
Authentication strength needed (MFA, strong identity proofing)?
Do you need audit logs for access and changes?
Is there a public API for third-party access?

addons.label: Identity proofing + verification
addons.description: Support KYC-like identity proofing, document verification, and verification workflows.

addons.label: Accessibility + localization pack
addons.description: Add accessibility requirements and multilingual support for citizen-facing systems.

addons.label: Public API protection (rate limits + WAF posture)
addons.description: Protect citizen-facing/public APIs against abuse while maintaining uptime.

devtools_developer_platforms.label: DevTools & Developer Platforms
devtools_developer_platforms.description: CI/CD products, cloud management tools, infrastructure automation SaaS.

critical_axes.question: Is it multi-tenant (multiple teams/orgs)?
Do you need integrations (Git providers, cloud accounts, ticketing, etc.)?
Is there a public API (CLI/SDK) for developers?
Do you need audit logs for admin actions and configuration changes?
Do you need supply-chain security (signing/SBOM/attestations)?

addons.label: Enterprise SSO + SCIM provisioning
addons.description: SSO, group sync, and automated user lifecycle management for enterprise customers.

addons.label: Audit logging (control plane)
addons.description: Immutable logs for admin actions, config changes, and sensitive operations.

addons.label: Artifact signing + attestations (supply chain)
addons.description: Provenance, SBOM, and signature verification support.

gaming_platforms.label: Gaming Platforms
gaming_platforms.description: Online game backends, matchmaking, leaderboards, game asset delivery.

critical_axes.question: Expected peak concurrent players/connections?
Latency sensitivity (casual vs competitive)?
Do you need anti-cheat / abuse protection?
Do you need realtime state sync (multiplayer sessions)?
How large are assets/logs (data volume)?

addons.label: Anti-cheat + abuse protection
addons.description: Rate limits, bot detection hooks, and hardened network posture.

addons.label: Player communications (chat/voice hooks)
addons.description: Enable optional player comms integrations (chat/voice) with moderation controls.

addons.label: Ranked + tournaments
addons.description: Seasonal ladders, tournaments, and scheduled events require job orchestration.

logistics_supply_chain.label: Logistics & Supply Chain Systems
logistics_supply_chain.description: Shipment tracking, warehouse systems, route optimization.

critical_axes.question: Do you integrate with carriers, ERP, marketplaces, or EDI?
Do you need geolocation tracking (GPS, geofences)?
Do you need realtime status updates (tracking/live ETAs)?
Is optimization compute-heavy (routing/packing/forecasting)?
Data sensitivity level (customer addresses, driver info, etc.)?

addons.label: Carrier webhook ingestion + retries
addons.description: Durable webhook processing and retry semantics for carrier events.

addons.label: ETA notifications (SMS/email/push)
addons.description: Customer-facing notifications for shipment status and ETAs.

addons.label: Fine-grained access controls (ABAC)
addons.description: Restrict data by region, customer, or role to support multiple business units.

search_knowledge_systems.label: Search & Knowledge Systems
search_knowledge_systems.description: Enterprise search, document indexing, semantic search, knowledge graphs.

critical_axes.question: Do you need full-text search and indexing?
Do you need semantic/vector search?
How many documents/records will be indexed?
How complex are permissions for search results filtering?
Index freshness SLA (how quickly changes must appear in search)?

addons.label: Connectors + crawling (SaaS sources)
addons.description: Index content from Google Drive, Slack, Jira, Confluence, S3, etc.

addons.label: Semantic retrieval (RAG-ready)
addons.description: Embeddings pipelines, chunking, and retrieval patterns for AI assistants.

addons.label: Permission-aware search filtering
addons.description: Enforce document-level ACLs at query time.

communication_infrastructure_platforms.label: Communication Infrastructure Platforms
communication_infrastructure_platforms.description: Email delivery, SMS gateways, push notification systems, VoIP services (product is communication infrastructure itself).

critical_axes.question: Is this offered as a public API to customers (CPaaS-style)?
Do you need delivery guarantees (retries, idempotency, DLQ)?
Throughput tier (messages per second)?
Any compliance requirements (SOC2, ISO27001, etc.)?
Do you need anti-abuse protections (spam, A2P controls, rate limits)?

addons.label: Abuse protection (rate limits + fraud controls)
addons.description: Prevent spam, OTP abuse, credential stuffing, and message flooding.

addons.label: Delivery receipts + webhooks
addons.description: Webhook callbacks and delivery status ingestion require durable processing.

addons.label: Template management (email/SMS/push)
addons.description: Versioned templates, localization, and approval workflows.

security_cybersecurity.label: Security & Cybersecurity
security_cybersecurity.description: Cross-cutting security toggles (only becomes a domain if building a security product).

toggles.label: IAM / SSO
toggles.description: Centralized identity, SSO, and stronger auth posture.

toggles.label: SIEM / Threat detection
toggles.description: Security telemetry, detection rules, and incident workflows.

toggles.label: Encryption / Key management
toggles.description: KMS-managed encryption and rotation posture.

toggles.label: Zero-trust access
toggles.description: Harden internal/admin access with least privilege and strong verification.

observability_monitoring.label: Observability & Monitoring
observability_monitoring.description: Logging, metrics, tracing, and alerting (attachable to any domain).

toggles.label: Logging
toggles.description: Centralized structured logs with retention controls.

toggles.label: Metrics
toggles.description: Service metrics, dashboards, and SLO foundations.

toggles.label: Tracing
toggles.description: Distributed tracing for latency breakdown and dependency mapping.

toggles.label: Alerting
toggles.description: Alert rules, on-call routing, and incident workflows.

compliance_governance.label: Compliance & Governance
compliance_governance.description: GDPR/HIPAA/PCI, audit logs, and data residency controls.

toggles.label: GDPR controls
toggles.description: Privacy controls and governance posture for GDPR environments.

toggles.label: HIPAA controls
toggles.description: Healthcare compliance posture and enhanced auditability.

toggles.label: PCI-DSS controls
toggles.description: Payments compliance posture with strong security controls.

toggles.label: Audit logs
toggles.description: Who-did-what-when logging for sensitive operations.

toggles.label: Data residency
toggles.description: Ensure data remains in a required geography/region.

scalability_high_availability.label: Scalability & High Availability
scalability_high_availability.description: Auto-scaling, multi-region, and disaster recovery toggles.

toggles.label: Auto-scaling
toggles.description: Scale services based on demand with safe limits.

toggles.label: Multi-region
toggles.description: Active-active or active-passive multi-region architecture.

toggles.label: Disaster recovery
toggles.description: Define DR posture and enforce backup/restore readiness.

performance_caching.label: Performance & Caching
performance_caching.description: CDN, caching layers, and query optimization.

toggles.label: CDN
toggles.description: Edge caching and acceleration for global performance.

toggles.label: Redis / Memcache
toggles.description: Caching/session storage for lower latency and reduced DB load.

toggles.label: Query optimization
toggles.description: Indexes, read models, and query performance posture.

billing_subscription.label: Billing & Subscription
billing_subscription.description: Payment integration, usage tracking, and invoicing.

toggles.label: Payment integration
toggles.description: Collect payments and manage payment flows.

toggles.label: Usage tracking
toggles.description: Meter usage for quotas, overages, and analytics.

toggles.label: Invoicing
toggles.description: Generate invoices, receipts, and billing artifacts.

toggles.label: Subscriptions
toggles.description: Plans, renewals, proration, trials, and cancellation flows.

notifications.label: Notifications
notifications.description: Email, SMS, and push notification capabilities.

toggles.label: Email notifications
toggles.description: Transactional and marketing email delivery hooks.

toggles.label: SMS notifications
toggles.description: OTP and transactional SMS delivery hooks.

toggles.label: Push notifications
toggles.description: Mobile/web push notifications with token management.

background_processing.label: Background Processing
background_processing.description: Queues, worker systems, and cron/scheduled jobs.

toggles.label: Queues
toggles.description: Async buffering and decoupling for workloads.

toggles.label: Worker systems
toggles.description: Background workers for asynchronous processing.

toggles.label: Cron jobs / scheduled jobs
toggles.description: Recurring jobs for billing runs, cleanups, and reports.

search.label: Search
search.description: Full-text search, semantic search, and indexing pipelines.

toggles.label: Full-text search
toggles.description: Indexing + keyword search over documents/records.

toggles.label: Semantic search
toggles.description: Embeddings-based similarity search and retrieval flows.
